title: South Africa: Uber v Authorities - Regulatory Headaches Abound for Popular Taxi Service
text:
South Africa: Alliance Summit - Nkandla and E-Tolls Spoil the Bonding Party 
Last Saturday, Mukrim was pulled over by an undercover traffic cop who demanded to see his papers. Mukrim supplied him with his valid operating permit, professional driving permit and driver's licences, all of which Mukrim showed journalists on Wednesday. The traffic cop became aggressive, Mukrim alleges, and accused Mukrim of driving for Uber - which Mukrim admitted he did, but not at the time he... South Africa
